channel.title: Dee Piggott on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Dee Piggott on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Go4IT digital inclusion service
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm DW - Diane Webb RM - Ross McNicol DP - Dee Piggott PH - Pamela Hewison MD Iriss.fm visited the Glasgow Centre for Inclusive Living which hosts 'Go4IT', a digital inclusion service for adults with disabilities who are supported by Quarriers. We spoke to Diane Webb, Digital Inclusion Lead at Quarriers about how the Go4IT programme began and the type of courses it provides. Diane received a TalkTalk Digital Hero Award in 2014 for her work with Go4IT.
